title: Movie Poster Type; Horror Genre
content:
We've had the thread: [Brush Scripts c 1940s movie poseters](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31976), but I'm more interested in the horror genre. There might be a thread, but my advanced search (using google) doesn't show anything on the first 5 pages.

Movies such as:  
 [Tarantula](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173104/http:/www.allposters.com/gallery.asp?CID=D09B04D472DB428097E091E17D96C469&startat=/getposter.asp%3FAPNum%3D936221%26CID%3DD09B04D472DB428097E091E17D96C469%26PPID%3D1%26search%3Dvintage%2520movie%26f%3Dt%26FindID%3D0%26P%3D1%26PP%3D24%26sortby%3DRD%26cname%3D%26SearchID%3D)  
 ["THEM"](http://web.archive.org/web/20120126173104/http:/www.allposters.com/gallery.asp?CID=d09b04d472db428097e091e17d96c469&startat=/getposter.asp%3FCID%3Dd09b04d472db428097e091e17d96c469%26PPID%3D1%26apnum%3D936647%26search%3D42011%26f%3Dc%26FindID%3D42011%26SearchID%3D)

This is a type ID thread it is a "let's create a thread where we can list great vintage horror movie fonts" thread. Unless, of course, it already exists. Just show me and I'll close this thread down. No need to be redundant.

Edit: Use Allposters.com for more inspiration. If you find a movie that you particularly like go ahead and link it here.
author: Miss Tiffany
